question: Which among the following was the correct title of National Anthem of India, when it was originally penned by Rabindranath Tagore?
explanation: The National Anthem of India was originally composed as Bharoto Bhagyo Bidhata in the Tatwabodhini Patrika (Published by Debendranath Tagore), which was the official publication of the Brahmo Samaj. by poet Rabindranath Tagore. It was adopted on 24th January 1950.
